## AttributeName.WritingMode_TbRl field

Attribute WritingMode: TbRl - 从上到下的内联进程；阻止从右到左的进程。这是中文和日文书写系统的典型书写模式。

```csharp
public static readonly AttributeName WritingMode_TbRl;
```
